english: Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah, was found guilty of: ambushing and killing
Ertokuş Bey and the soldiers under his command; killing
Tuğtekin Bey, the Alpbaşı of the Dodurga tribe,
of the Alps of the Dodurga tribe who survived the ambush.
(Rabarba) Ertuğrul Bey is innocent. Ertuğrul is innocent.
...it is not Ertuğrul who put me in this state...
Our lord (Rabarba) is innocent. Thank God.

text: Eğer onun bu başarıları Sultan Alaeddin'in kulağına giderse...
english: If these achievements of his reach Sultan Alaeddin...
...the dream of becoming a frontier principality will be over, just a dream!
I need to show my teeth now.

text: Ağabey, vakit dişini değil aklını gösterme vaktidir.
english: Brother, now is the time to show your brains, not your teeth.

text: Ertuğrul, Korkut'un da obanın da gözünde kahraman oldu.
english: Ertuğrul became a hero in the eyes of both Korkut and the entire tribe.
Either you will perform a greater act of heroism than him...
How did you escape? We were

text: İkimiz de ağır yaralandık beyim. Kendimden geçmişim.
english: both seriously injured, sir. I was beside myself.

text: Gözümü açtığımda bir köydeydim. Bir baktım Samsa orada.
english: When I opened my eyes, I was in a village. I looked and Samsa was there. My brother

text: Bulmuş, kurtarmış, götürmüş köye beni kardeşim.

We stayed in the village until I recovered.

text: Sonra da iki at bulup obaya döndük beyim.
english: Then we found two horses and returned to the camp, my lord. Did

text: Beni iyice anladın mı ahmak herif?

text: Onlar huzura çıkmadan önce işlerini göreceksin.

would like Gündoğdu Bey to take charge of the Alps.
